lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Would I remember anything about the Stassmans?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're kind of the Addams Family of Kamordah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They actually, on one of the houses that many of the various diplomats and nobles from across the empire and sometimes the Menagerie Coast come and invite them to stay with them, partially to show off what they have, and to make more connections to possibly continue to embolden that collection.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like the family from The 'Burbs, I'm very excited.

lines.text: "But please, make the place your own, "and if anything does come up that can be of help to you, "I'll let you know, but please understand, "this is beyond me."

lines.text: We can't do any of that without allies and without information, you have both.

lines.text: "If you were to deliver it safely to Shadycreek "by a three-week span from today, leaving a week from now, "let's see here, that will pay out 2500 gold pieces."

lines.text: We will certainly consider your offer, and we thank you for the sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you head down, there's the spiral staircase that leads inside, and to the immediate right and up, there's a balcony, and you can see there is a bedroom up there, and a small staircase underneath that leads up, and he points to it and says--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the record, the assassin can pass through stone, and was jumping in and out of the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So if it shows up, just please leave."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Food, drink, at your disposal, we are friends."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's good to see you all safe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we walk away, I walk over to Jester and put a hand on her shoulder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I lean on the other shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What'd you think? Did you see the look in his eyes, did you get anything, the glint, recognition?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you make of him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is, even from my experience with complicated individuals and underworld types, and I have had some experience, I haven't quite pinned down what I think yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he is literally a slippery one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, if he is your dad, fuck him, right? Why do you want a relationship with someone who doesn't want a relationship with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you knew he was your dad, would you be proud of that, happy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (tearfully) But if he doesn't want me, then I don't want him, it's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just wrap my arms around her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sometimes found family is better anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My dad didn't want me either, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could human traffic all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was like, if he is my dad, I just don't want him to do slaves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry, I was thinking about carts, anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Rick voice) What do you mean?! Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the Gentleman gives out payment to the employees, each one stepping forward and being handed their pay before he goes and requests that one of the finer bottles of wine, brought in from Feolinn, is given to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feolinn's like, from the Menagerie Coast, one of the wine spots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go to the bar with Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a swig from the bottle, take it with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, me and you going to the bar? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything you guys want to do, or are you just bedding up for the night to rest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could I have a milk, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) The guy behind goes, "(grunts) Yeah, I'll get you milk."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get some hot water and make my own tea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate the offer, but I'm fine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you heard of the Blooming Grove?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's much more than that, but yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, bring me a bit. I'm curious."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know where they are, and I don't know if they're okay, and it's been a long time, and there is a part of me that is very lonely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check, with advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll gladly leave you some tea, if not for yourself, to impress somebody who might be impressed by such things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I apologize, I'm a little-- Family is so complicated, and I was cruel, on occasion, to my siblings, and not as honest with my parents as I wish I could've been, but it is a unique and exquisite complication, family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A brother I don't care to speak of anymore, or speak to."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it would do you good, both of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is the one who has missed out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I drink half of the milk, and it's really bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really bad, Caleb, it smelled really terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please spray rotten milk all over the Gentleman's bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not like a full vomit, but you just spit it back up immediately, and just like, oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (choked) It's good you didn't drink it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Frumpkin comes, starts licking the milk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I still at the bar with Nott?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No lime. Salt." And he pulls a pouch of salt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have some of the rotten hallucinogenic fruit that we took that one time, you could rub that on the rim.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you thought about that secret you were going to tell me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you thought about that secret you were going to tell me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we're still doing that thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It really looks from your eyes like you've been thinking about this. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Been a week, surely you have. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we go at the same time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or should we flip for it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tails. Wait, tails you go first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or tails you get to choose?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm drunk, oh, that was a big flip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put your arm away from my face! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, he was filthy, obviously, and very-- I mean, he smelled awful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just saw him one night, sort of trying to look out the window, the moonlight was hitting his face, and he was very handsome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I kind of got that vibe before, thought there might be that feeling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then I got to know him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might have a similar problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's me! It's your way of telling me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up, shut up! It's Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what? I'm sorry, what?? (whispering) I'm sorry, what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just a crush, I just don't know what to do with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, look at this face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are going to let it slip!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what about her? For me, it's his rugged jawline, it's his intellect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you talking about Caleb again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to act on it or anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wouldn't have thought she's your type.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think she thinks that I'm her type.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not serious though about this, this is a crush, this is not a thing--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --that you're going to actually pursue, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, have you noticed that she doesn't know anything about herself? Like she doesn't know who she is, she doesn't know what she likes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could be lost, she could be a sea right now, and you could be the anchor that brings her home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could be the flame in the darkness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think that's how anchors work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be the anchor that brings her to the bottom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't even consider that as a possibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll find something I can do here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, confiding! This was an exercise in confiding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got a dating sim mini-game, fuck yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is our girl thing, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this, what're you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, I invented it just now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, but no matter what, we're not letting this break up the three of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not going to change anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I do all three of the shots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll walk back over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all bedding down for the night? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just fucking throw a coin at Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, are you guys planning to crash here tonight then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I didn't mean to invade your space for secrets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Huh? No, just don't punch me in the face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, it's not the assassin again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a sense that something is off, and you come in the middle of the night, maybe, you have no idea what hour it is, but everyone else is dead asleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't realize we were going to stop, I was about to say, who's taking first watch? Caleb's already said, we're never going to sleep without somebody awake ever again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The dome is up in the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dome is worthless for this woman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a little bit, and you catch yourself, and you have this weird sense, and you glance over, and at the curtains that are drawn at the balcony, where the steps lead up, you see a figure just looking in, and as soon as you straighten up, the figure (whooshes) ducks around the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I see what the figure looked like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the light's coming to the inside, so just the outline, just a bit of figure peeking in, and they vanish around the corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and peek out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You peek out the door? You look out the edge, and you can see, walking towards the bar, the room itself is fairly empty except for the ogre bodyguard, but you see, briskly walking to the bar, the Gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather that he was probably the one who was looking in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I go chase him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you start descending the steps, he looks up at you, and you see this, he puts a second glass of wine, or puts a glass up onto the counter, and he begins to pour it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah." Looks over, and gives another shoo motion to the ogre, who (grunts) leaves the room and heads into one of the back open archway and closes the door, so it's just the two of you in the chamber, definitively.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did you leave? Why didn't you come back? Did you know that I was...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But our ship was attacked, "and I was taken prisoner and dragged to Darktow."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's told me stories about you, she said you were the most charming person in the entire world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could've just said, yes, I'm your dad, and oh man, Jester, I didn't know about you, but man, I really want to hang out and get to know you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But for whatever it counts, "I see a lot of her in you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I kind of want to protect you "from the darker parts of the worlds where we've crossed."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes a big drink of his wine, puts it back down, rubs his forehead, shakes off his hand. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) So basically, you can't smuggle people ever again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should I tell Mama? What should I tell her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These last few months, I've just been keeping so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But when you walked in, "all of that's changed now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you should go back to Nicodranas, secretly, and sweep her off her feet, and the two of you could ride off into the sunset, take a ship somewhere, and just live happily ever after.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Dad? Next time I'm in town, let's play some Uno.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes a deep breath, and then keeps walking to his bedchamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I go back to bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's when we take our break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Short rest, rolled some hit dice, and fucked us up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could overhear your conversation end, like oh, how are you? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See you guys in a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show me what you got! ♪ You got the perfect warlock ♪ ♪ Her weapons and supplies ♪ ♪ But you need a place to track your stuff ♪ ♪ 'Cause you're so disorganized ♪ ♪ You click open the webpage ♪ ♪ You heard about on Critical Role ♪ ♪ And now you're ready to kick some butt ♪ ♪ In that mineshaft full of gnolls ♪ ♪ It's D&D, D&D, yeah! ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪ ♪ Yeah, D&D, D&D ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪ ♪ You got your stats, you got your swords ♪ ♪ And you've got your invisible wand ♪ ♪ It's D&D, D&D ♪ ♪ D&D ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪

lines.text: Of course I flinched! Did you see what happened last time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never practiced this ever in my entire life.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Since he's such a recent convert, how did being labeled this way sit with Fjord? Does he feel he deserves it yet, or still has much to learn before he can be in the same category as Caduceus?

lines.text: Yeah, I think even in that moment-- (ice clanging)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I have been jaded or blind to the world.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What else is new? Let's take a look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I love her! She's so wonderful.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I feel like we have met this person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I mean, we've seen her at conventions.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! He gave me his iPad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the questions are right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, finally. (sighs) For both of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seriously, who gets stabbed when you're checking out? That's terrible.

lines.text: What do you mean, it looked cool?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, I just saw my lip going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that the first time you've ever done that?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay, lower that octopus and do it once.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You guys, do you know every week, people think we're so fucking high?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not Brian! What kind of black magic is this, where's my friend? Where's that fucking cat? Tina!

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, you guys know each other?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Of course we know each other! Who doesn't know the greatest realm-walker in the all the game-verse?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The grand Titan of Ov, the mother of all critters, Miss Laura Give-Me-the-Fucking-Harps Bailey!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The mother of--? Yeah, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your screams gave this baby a lot of juice last time, but now, we need something stronger than fear: true love, with him, or anyone you fancy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just, we need to get this baby cooking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Minnesota Jones just suggested that you should find love with maybe someone else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, why are we so bad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three orders failed, we only had four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) The three of the four were wrong?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, your fucking oil is on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go into the corner! Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, I never get them!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so sick of your shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I'll take care of everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, go, go! And then I'll do this one.

lines.text: This is, oh! Damn it! Fuck! I can't grab anything, I want to grab the damn fryer! Shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so weird! Oh, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not going to (gags) I choked! It's not a carrot. (laughs) (Western music) (upbeat music)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (spooky music) (bird cawing) (explosion bangs) (creepy laughter) (heartbeat) (baby crying) I'm a fan of-- ("Spring" by Antonio Vivaldi) (dramatic music) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Over the break, why didn't we discuss what we're doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We had to eat peanut butter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the day is yours, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are going to look in on them, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going to join with Pumat to double our fun?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because he can do it, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He probably totally survived the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't go through the Tri-Spire, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gentleman's to Pumat's? No, but the Tri-Spire is visible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we ever get word on the family, on whether or not they were all right? Did they figure that out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go ahead and ask about that? About which family, your family?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two members of the family were killed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I told you they were probably dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that does help, that sort of paints them as being innocent collectors of antiquities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, more interested in the object

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That I would think would be a little more viable."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So should we head back to Pumat's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there any place you want to stop on the way to Pentamarket, or just bee-line there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the way out, we'll check to see if there's anyone waiting to see who exits this establishment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eyes open the whole fucking time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But nobody seems to be paying you specific mind beyond just the occasional glances from passersby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately, no, but if you continue to travel, you can eventually begin to hear things like one town crier in the distance, you hear, shouting out, "War front, positive successes in the east! "Ashguard Garrison reclaimed for the Empire!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting note, there is actually a standard accent for all criers in every town.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They all have a high bari-tenor voice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We were all raised "in the crier pits to the west."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you have any packages coming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a no, or are you saying my name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yeah, but I want to hang back a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we walking to the Pillow Trove?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we talk about girl stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, look at this. I don't know what we're going to, but come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm getting swept up-- I feel-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys admire the harvest-themed decorations throughout the city, the brown and red and golden tapestries, and you can see there are some decorations that show the recent Harvest's-- what is it? Here it is, the-- the Harvest's Rise Festival was but a day, two days ago, I think, so there's still decorations up, and there's still elements of celebration around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So remember the letter that we sent to Astrid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course I remember the letter that we sent to Astrid, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we told her to send something back to the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Send something back, is that what we did?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She said-- we told her we'd be staying at the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me send a message to the proprietor of the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just wondering if we have any packages there for me, or Nott the Brave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did we sign the letter? It was a legal firm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a lawyer title, like a law office.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Madame Luenna responds, and says, "It appears there is package present "for a Nott and Brave, "it is attention to a Lavore."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, we have to tell everybody what we did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An enemy sent us a love letter or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could be a murderer, but also have a flourishing pen pal love life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did we say in the letter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was very drunk at the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, you talked me into it, I don't remember--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we said something like, we want to meet Astrid because we have-- I think we were-- You know what it was? We have the estate of your uncle, and we want to give you some sort of will, you were left something in a will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the dumbest thing. That's, like, the stupid--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the thing back is like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Like, if it's poison or something, something that will explode as soon as we open it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got Mage Hand, and we'll have Caduceus open it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you just check for traps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, how are you feeling about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, how do we tell the others that we need to go there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've sort of been yelling the last 20 seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi guys! Oh, these periods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might have to just make a quick little swing around the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, a while ago, I let you know that we had reached out to, oh boy, I can't even remember her name, what was her name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We told you about that, you know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or somebody else from the Academy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah so, the package is at the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But this is when we thought that she was just somebody that Caleb loved and he wasn't talking to her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It turns out, we were contacting our enemy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we didn't know at the time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you propose to go and collect this package?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go in as somebody else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And say you're picking it up on behalf of the Nott and Brave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you talking about, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should go, because I cannot be found.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can also disguise yourself, correct?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I should disguise myself as you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The package is for you and me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will give really good money if it's just junk mail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's actually not a bad deal.
